pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimating Means, Standard Deviations and Visualising Distributions using Quantiles // Implements a novel density- based approach for estimating unknown means, visualizing distributions, and meta-analyses of quantiles. A detailed vignettes with example datasets and code to prepare data and analyses is available at https://bookdown.org/a2delivera/metaquant/. The methods are described in the pre-print by De Livera, Prendergast and Kumaranathunga (2024, doi:10.48550/arXiv.2411.10971).
